short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search highlighted text on wiktionary when the extension icon is clicked.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browsing experience with the Wiktionary Search Highlighter! Highlight any text on a web page and quickly search its definition on Wiktionary with just a click. If the term isn't found on Wiktionary, the extension will automatically search for it on Google, ensuring you always get the information you need. Ideal for students, writers, and anyone looking to expand their vocabulary.
